# [t-gummer.github.io](http://t-gummer.github.io)

## An R Markdown Website!

To build the website, run [`rmarkdown::render_site()`](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/rmarkdown_websites.html). This website is hosted via [Github Pages](https://pages.github.com/).
